title: Property Transfer Tax (Approval and Exemption) Order, 2015
content:
12th June, 2015 Statutory Instruments 111
GOVERNMENT OF ZAMBIA
STATUTORY INSTRUMENT NO. 31 OF 2015
The Property Transfer Tax Act
(Laws, Volume 19, Cap. 340)
The Property Transfer Tax (Approval and Exemption)
Order, 2015
IN EXERCISE of the powers contained in section six of the Property
Transfer Tax Act, the following Order is made:
1. This Order may be cited as the Property Transfer Tax (Approval Title
and Exemption) Order, 2015.
2. The transfer of property from Zambia National Oil Company Approval of
(In Liquidation) to the Government of the Republic of Zambia is exemption
from tax
approved for the purpose of exemption from tax in the amount
specified in the Schedule.
SCHEDULE
(Paragraph 2)
TRANSFERED PROPERTY
Property Amount
1. Ndola Fuel Terminal K41,234.33
2. Plot No. 2392 situated along
Longolongo Road, Lusaka K2,500.00
A. B. CHIKWANDA,
LUSAKA Minister of Finance
8th June, 2015
[MFAL.102/9/218]
Copies of this Statutory Instrument can be obtained from the Government Printer,
P.O. Box 30136, 10101, Lusaka, Price K2.00 each
112 Statutory Instruments 12th June, 2015
